Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. It comes with a range of features that are sure to enhance your daily experience. Considering its quality and functionality, I believe it's worth more than what the market typically offers. I'm extending this opportunity to you at an exclusive price of $150. This is a limited-time offer, so please let me know if you're interested in securing it. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $150. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $150
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $120
